parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns array with all items assigned to the [[handgunWeapon]] except magazines. Use [[handgunMagazine]] command for the latter. This command is used for infantry weapons only.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''handgunItems''' unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - [silencer, laserpointer/flashlight, optics, bipod]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[handgunItems]] [[player]]; 
/*
[
	"muzzle_snds_L",	//silencer
	"",			//laser
	"",			//optics
	""			//bipod
]
<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>*/</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>
</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[addHandgunItem]], [[removeHandgunItem]], [[removeAllHandgunItems]], [[weaponAccessories]], [[weaponAccessoriesCargo]], [[primaryWeaponItems]], [[secondaryWeaponItems]], [[weaponsItems]], [[binocularItems]], [[weaponsItemsCargo]]
</value></part></template></root>
